MDecryptorException - Exception in com.tinmegali.security.mcipher.exceptions
An 'wrapper' Exception thrown by decryption operations, that wraps it up numerous Exception that can be thrown by the MDecryptorDefault.decryptData(byte[], Cipher) The Throwable.getMessage() holds an message, containing the original Exception, that you can fetch it with Throwable.getCause()
